name: Akido Labs
headline: Unlocking data to tackle homelessness, chronic disease, and more
description:
For the first time in history, technology exists to create a healthcare system that anticipates your needs and responds with precision, and is always accessible to all, regardless of financial means or geography.

Since 2015, Akido Labs singular focus has been to make this vision a reality.
generated_description:
Akido Labs is on a mission to unlock data to address pressing issues like homelessness and chronic disease. Founded in 2015 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W15, Akido believes that technology can reshape healthcare, making it more predictive and accessible, independent of a patient's financial status or location.

Based in Los Angeles, California, Akido Labs boasts a robust team of around 1,000 employees. Their notable partner, Garry Tan, lends additional credibility to their innovative approach. The company operates within the realms of healthcare and artificial intelligence, striving to make exceptional healthcare universal.

What’s interesting about Akido is its commitment to building a future-proof healthcare ecosystem. Their platform, Scope AI, aims to enhance the healthcare experience by significantly reducing wait times, eliminating copays, and restoring house call services—essentially rewriting the traditional patient journey. They focus on personalizing care through a suite of tailored services, including life and disability insurance, mental health coverage, and medical reimbursements.

Their groundbreaking use of AI not only aims to create high-quality healthcare access but also fosters a more humane patient experience. With over 620,000 planned patient visits and a network of 245 healthcare providers across 96 locations, Akido Labs is pushing towards a future where healthcare is not just a service but a fundamental human right.

If you'd like to learn more or explore career opportunities, visit their website at [akidolabs.com](http://akidolabs.com). They are positioned not just as a company, but as a catalyst for change in the healthcare industry. 

For a quick dive into their offerings and vision, check out [Akido Care](http://akidolabs.com/akido-care) and [Scope AI](http://akidolabs.com/scope-ai) where you can see their ambitious approach to transforming healthcare.
